titles.title: Expanding Access to Low Cost Generic Drugs Act
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to ensure that valid generic drugs may enter the market.
Expanding Access to Low Cost Generic Drugs Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Low Cost Generic Drugs Act
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to disqualify from receiving market exclusivity a generic drug manufacturer who enters into an agreement with the patent holder for a brand name drug to delay getting the generic drug approved or to delay marketing it.
